reasons.text: You're too school for cool
Your grandma told you so
You wish your boyfriend was hot like I am
You can't cash me outside
Mayonnaise is not an instrument
You're friends with the Nigerian Prince
Deodorant: try it sometime
You order seasonal drinks from Starbucks out of season
You're on this website
You forgot the Alamo, didn't you?
You still can't find Waldo
You voted for Mickey Mouse
You were voted King of the Nerds
Winning is illogical
This site has deemed you one
You literally can't even
You sunbathe on your roof. Naked. In the city.
You've had your blinker on for the past 5 blocks
Victory is not yours
We are not the champions
Your losing streak is a world record
You surrender
You didn't stop in the name of love
You kept going during Hammer Time
If you play hide-and-seek, nobody would look for you
You're still doing the Harlem Shake
Your mother dresses you funny
You use Comic Sans
Everything changed when you attacked
You can't make my hands clap
You just lost The Game
You actually paid an arm and a leg
You ate a jellyfish
Bob Ross is your wallpaper. Everywhere.
It wasn't what you thought it'd be
It went over your head
Why not?
You got frozen in carbonite
You looked back
You didn't push the payload
You didn't splat the flyfish
"No Mom, this is online, I can't just pause it, start dinner without me!"
You tried to simply walk into Mordor
You didn't turn it off and back on again
You wore red to a rodeo
You're still dabbing on them haters
You spoke when you had the right to remain silent
You failed your saving throw
"Unexpected token on line 32"
You didn't hear the Creeper coming
Your squad dropped in Tilted Towers
You still use Internet Explorer
You think the Coronavirus comes from Corona beer
You spell it "looser"
You walked past the TV and I missed four episodes
You can't even make a simple Hello World program
You thought you were the chosen one
You don't wear your mask.
You just are. We need to come to terms with this fact.
You're still using Windows 98
You kinda sus ngl
You have too many Chrome tabs open
You don't drink enough water
The NSA deemed you too uninteresting to monitor
Your penpals send you "Cease and Desist" letters
You vented in front of me and I was near the button
You're using a joke website when you have other things you should be doing
You shot the sheriff
You invested in MySpace
You are Mute Button challenged
You became what you swore to destroy
You still haven't updated your computer
You wore socks with sandals
The reflection in the mirror scared you
You put an unexpected item in the bagging area
It be like that sometimes
You were on an escalator, it broke, and you thought you were stuck
Your name gets the red squiggle under it when you type it
You were wearing a costume with wings so you jumped off a building
You made out in front of your grandmother
You don't like memes. Period.
You've been wearing the same underwear for three days straight
You want to be friends with a YouTuber
You still play Fortnite
You bit the dust
You got 2nd place in a losing contest
You updated the autopsy report
If your brains were dynamite, you wouldn't have enough to blow your nose
You think "sus" is funny
You gave me up, let me down, ran around, and forgot me
Even Coronavirus doesn't want to get close to you
You didn't expect the spanish inquisition
You get nothing. You LOSE. Good DAY, SIR
You can't move it move it
You dug straight down
You aren't a wizard, Harry
You must construct additional pylons
You dress like a spicy tuna roll
You got the thundercloud from the item box
Your Joy-Cons drift
Your number neighbor wants to move
Your final smash missed
You didn't have the high ground
You killed my father, prepare to die
You didn't just roll a Nat 1, you rolled a 0
You fell for it! Thunder Cross Split Attack!
You deleted system32
The owner of this website doesn't approve your suggestions
You regret using that Masterball on a Magikarp
You went on a 3-hour trip, but left your mask at home
You tried to out pizza the Hut
You killed a mockingbird
You don't read the Terms of Service
You don't have apple bottom jeans or boots with the fur
It's your fault the archives are incomplete
You didn't stop it and get some help
You won a free cruise
Your answer to everything is "your mom"
Haven't you ever heard of closing a gosh darn door?
